title: Introduction to Python Data Science
summary: Learn the fundamentals of data science using Python and popular libraries
description: This comprehensive course covers Python basics, data manipulation with Pandas, data visualization with Matplotlib, and introduction to machine learning with Scikit-learn. Perfect for beginners in data science.

title: Modern UI/UX Design Principles
summary: Master the art of creating user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interfaces
description: Dive deep into modern design principles, user research methods, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing. Learn industry-standard tools like Figma and Adobe XD.

title: Full Stack JavaScript Development
summary: Build modern web applications with JavaScript, Node.js, and React
description: Complete guide to modern JavaScript development. Cover everything from ES6+ features to building full-stack applications using Node.js, Express, React, and MongoDB.

title: Ethical Hacking Fundamentals
summary: Learn cybersecurity basics and ethical hacking techniques
description: Comprehensive introduction to cybersecurity, covering network security, penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and security best practices. Includes hands-on labs and real-world scenarios.

title: Cross-Platform Mobile Development
summary: Build iOS and Android apps using React Native
description: Learn to develop mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using React Native. Cover app architecture, native components, state management, and deployment processes.

title: AWS Cloud Architecture
summary: Master cloud computing with Amazon Web Services
description: Comprehensive guide to AWS cloud services, covering EC2, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, and more. Learn to design scalable and secure cloud infrastructure for enterprise applications.
